description: Associates a delivery Channel with a particular NotificationConfiguration. Supported Channels include Chatbot, the Console Mobile Application, and emails (notifications-contacts).

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Channel to associate with the NotificationConfiguration. Supported ARNs include Chatbot, the Console Mobile Application, and notifications-contacts.

parameters.name: notificationConfigurationArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the NotificationConfiguration to associate with the Channel.
